document_data.name: Fareeansis
document_data.mainbody: '''Fareeansis''' was a [[balor]] who taught [[Jesanta Beril]] about demonbinding in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: While disguised as an old man, Fareeansis kept a sharp, red glint to his eyes.
document_data.History: At some point, Fareeansis was summoned and bound in the [[Prime Material plane]]. In the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Fareeansis met Jesanta Beril while disguised as a sage named '''Benedict'''. He taught her enough of [[Nar demonbinder]] lore, but not enough for her to bind him.
